website_summaries.verdict: Lots of nesting dolls with cute details that are appealing to kids and collectors.
pros: Adorable panda nesting dolls with pretty hand-painted details
Dolls are easy to open and close
Large collection contains 10 pandas, including a very tiny one
cons: Parental supervision is recommended for young kids, as the smaller dolls can become a choking hazard

customer_reviews.title: Positively enchanting!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing little set. My son shrieked with laughter and delight as the pandas got smaller and smaller! Oh my goodness, it seems like they never end. There are 10 pandas nested inside each other in this set, and the littlest one is so tiny (like a kernel of corn), that it is truly surprising and fun.
customer_reviews.author: C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt get these open. They werent fully cut. Very disappointing for a birthday present. I wouldnt reccomend them. If you must ...make sure they open before gifting them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Hard to snap & unsnap pieces for young kids
customer_reviews.text: So cute but so hard to put together & take apart- frustrates grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Rpeterson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for a 9 yo girl who loves pandas. Beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.author: dr.m

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old son and it is such good quality that I have no worries of him breaking them. The painting detail is well done and uniform. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: TBROWN

customer_reviews.title: Well made and my granddaughter loves it! What else counts?
customer_reviews.text: These nesting dolls are made well and come apart to make 10 dolls, the smallest about the size of a chocolate chip. My granddaughter has played with them for hours and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: The Guy from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly impressed by quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to expect but bought this for my daughter. It’s really high quality with great fit and finish. The center panda is super tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E

customer_reviews.title: Great for grade school children.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a for my granddaughters birthday. Her eyes lit up the moment she opened it. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly surprised at this. I love it. I don’t think it should be a toy though. And it does seam a tad smaller than pictured. But I still think it’s worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for panda lovers...
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my panda loving granddaughter. It was a huge hit. Very cute and nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: ellen770

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my teenaged granddaughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bredemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Product just as described. My Grandson loved the Pandas. Pandas are his favorite animal. Quality was as explained or better.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M

customer_reviews.title: All i was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: All pieces present and accounted for 5yr old loved playing with it
customer_reviews.author: Roman B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute for kids
customer_reviews.text: The paint job could use some help, but my daughter loves it and it’s cute and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift... they loved em they are made well and quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: April lopez

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: Bought Russian dolls that were made in Russia while visiting Russia some years ago. Discovered these dolls were made in China. Dolls are nice but country of origin should have been indicated in description.
customer_reviews.author: BudMan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The painting is beautiful & they seem pretty durable. Some of the larger nesting dolls are a little hard to open, & I think after opening it a lot the paint might start to chip, but overall a good purchase. The tiniest doll is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pandaa
customer_reviews.text: The pandas were a birthday gift for a close friend. We’ve had a long running tradition of buying panda gifts and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Gorin

product_meta.title: Moonmo Panda Nesting Dolls - 10 Pieces Matryoshka Panda - All Hollow to Fit Inside Each Other
product_meta.description:
Size: 14x11x11cm.
Rich color and different shapes.
.Really good for lovers showing the deep love.
Best choice for children as toys and for adults as decoration.
100% brand new items,traditional russian local work of art.
Can be used for holding candies,jewelry,sandries etc,not only beautiful but also practical.
Special wood through a long time dry ,gently and no taste, master craftsman carving and painting,beautiful and generous.
feature_bullets: ★These 10 dolls are of different size and the color combination is applied perfectly to match them together. The multicolored dolls go with every type of background color, so stop worrying about the mismatch
★These dolls are made up of basswood which is the perfect material for this kind of product. The high quality and sturdy wooden dolls are more durable than the cheap ones available in the market

★The package includes 10 pieces of exciting colorful Russian dolls that will be perfect in rooms of every color. This is very easy to use and do not take much space according to the size, and packed with environmental friendly, cotton drawstring bag

★These dolls are traditional Russian work of art. These nesting dolls were carved from a single piece of wood and later they were broken down into pieces. They were hand painted very carefully by the finest workers of the market

★These attractive Russian dolls are not just for looks. These are very useful and practical as well. You can keep you candies, jewelry etc in them according to your needs. Finding your jewelry at the last moment will never be so easy. For more different kinds of nesting dolls with different pieces and patterns, welcome to visit our store Moonmo
